commands.preHook: git checkout main && git pull origin main

commands.postHook: echo 'Remember to create PR with closes #XXX in description'

templates.name: start-issue
templates.template: Checkout main, pull latest, and start working on GitHub issue #{number}. Create feature branch and implement the requirements. When done, create a PR that closes the issue.

templates.name: fix-ci
templates.template: Implement the Claude review recommendations and fix any CI test failures for the current PR.
